dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Richard Silverstein
dmca.body:
To: (650)618-2680, Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA complaints 
From: Richard Silverstein 
Re: DCMA Violation & Defamatory Blogger Site 

Dear Sir: 

Someone calling himself Neil Pomper has created a defamatory blog at this URL: 

http://www.richardsilversteins.blogspot.com/

whose sole purpose is to mock and insult me. 

This site infringes on images I own and I have not authorized display of these images on this site: 

http://bp2.blogger.com/_RkuPpTUw07w/RgbSJv-8bAJ/AAAAAAAAAAM/4I1iQp2u0Yo/s1600-h/little+dickie.jpg 

http://commentisfree.guardian.co.uk/site_imagery/richard_silverstein_140x14O.jpg 

This site also defames me and uses my name in its URL. 

I demand that this site he taken down completely immediately. If it is not removed within 3 days I will file a DCMA notice through my lawyer and file suit both against Blogger and the blog author for defamation and infliction of personal suffering. 

This site invades my privacy, insults me personally, and defames my reputation. It also causes suffering to the family members whose privacy is also invaded. 

Please reply to this message immediately letting me know what action you plan to take. 

And please set your blog name filter to monitor future blogs that are created using my name
